# dxp-data



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property           | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                | Type     | Default     |
| ------------------ | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `default`          | `default` | A default value to display if the data in get is not found.                                                                                                                                                | `string` | `undefined` |
| `get` _(required)_ | `get`     | The JS-based expression to capture data from the above model.                                                                                                                                              | `string` | `undefined` |
| `modify`           | `modify`  | A pipe separated list of modifier expressions to modify the captured data. clip:<length>    truncate:<length>   date   format:<expression>   lowercase   uppercase   capitalize   size   encode   currency | `string` | `undefined` |
